31#ifndef _OPENSOLARIS_SYS_SIG_H_
32#define _OPENSOLARIS_SYS_SIG_H_
33
34#ifdef _KERNEL
35
36#include <sys/param.h>
37#include <sys/lock.h>
38#include <sys/mutex.h>
39#include <sys/proc.h>
40#include <sys/signalvar.h>
41#include <sys/debug.h>
42
43#define FORREAL 0
44#define JUSTLOOKING 1
45
46static __inline int
47issig(int why)
48{
49 struct thread *td = curthread;
50 struct proc *p;
51 int sig;
52
53 ASSERT(why == FORREAL || why == JUSTLOOKING);
54 if (SIGPENDING(td)) {
55 if (why == JUSTLOOKING)
56 return (1);
57 p = td->td_proc;
58 PROC_LOCK(p);
59 mtx_lock(&p->p_sigacts->ps_mtx);
60 sig = cursig(td, SIG_STOP_ALLOWED);
61 mtx_unlock(&p->p_sigacts->ps_mtx);
62 PROC_UNLOCK(p);
63 if (sig != 0)
64 return (1);
65 }
66 return (0);
67}
68
69#endif /* _KERNEL */
70
71#endif /* _OPENSOLARIS_SYS_SIG_H_ */
72
